Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial.adapter

Class DynamicTutorialsAdapter<V extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment,T extends Tutorial<T,V>>

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<androidx.viewpager2.adapter.FragmentViewHolder>
androidx.viewpager2.adapter.FragmentStateAdapter
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.adapter.DynamicFragmentStateAdapter
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial.adapter.DynamicTutorialsAdapter<V,T>
Type Parameters:
V - The type of the view or fragment this adapter will handle.
T - The type of the tutorial this adapter will handle.
All Implemented Interfaces:
androidx.viewpager2.adapter.StatefulAdapter
public class DynamicTutorialsAdapter<V extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment,T extends Tutorial<T,V>> extends DynamicFragmentStateAdapter
A DynamicFragmentStateAdapter to display the supplied Tutorial.
